modName: Overpowered Potatoes - Another Way of Healing
summary: A simple yet funny mod, that increases the default HP restoration of a potato from 1 to 2000
descriptionHtml:
ARE YOU IN LOVE WITH POTATOES? ARE POTATOES YOUR LIFE? 
Ever went into a dungeon, got caught up in a fight almost dying and furiously scavenging into your inventory only to find that you're out of potions? Fear no more! For the potatoes are here! Ever wondered why there are NPCs who sell groceries like tomatoes, cabbages, leeks, bread, cheese and POTATOES, but found that these items are practically non-useful? Now you'll actually have a reason to visit these stores, to get em potatoes!
This mod changes potatoes so that they heal [b]2000hp [/b]instead of that lousy 1hp. 
So get cracking, download this and support those poor farmers and street vendors who struggle to make a living!

To install place the folder into your Skyrim Directory (Usually under: (Username)/Program Files/Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim)

POTATO POTATO POTATOOOO~
author: McHappyMeal
